description:
Light but structured footwear, with a modern and functional design, perfect for fast hiking and use on mixed terrains. The upper, made of suede leather and synthetic fabric inserts, wraps the foot perfectly, thanks to the last designed to follow its ergonomics. The asymmetrical lacing and gusset give the fit a better degree of precision, thanks to a perfect wrapping throughout the movement.

Light EVA wedge perfect for impact with the ground dissipation. Specific Vibram Multiverse outsole for mixed terrain, with functional pattern also for approach, with maximum grip on the heel and full toe area for safety during climbing.
name: Kayland - R.O.I. Recreation Outfitters Inc. Alpha GTX - Mens
